microG F-Droid repo

This is a repository of microG apps to be used with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are signed official binaries built by the microG Team from the corresponding source code.

Currently it serves 3 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://microg.org/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
9B D0 67 27 E6 27 96 C0 13 0E B6 DA B3 9B 73 15 74 51 58 2C BD 13 8E 86 C4 68 AC C3 95 D1 41 65
